Unleash the Moroccan culture with Four Seasons Resort Marrakech
Four Seasons Resort Marrakech has teamed up with AXS to create a fully customisable cycling experience with the new Bike Adventure Package. Step inside the world of Moroccan adventure and capture exceptional memories in exploring the diversity of the Moroccan landscape by bike, from the vibrant Medina to the exotic Palmeraie and the ultimate exploration of the Atlas Mountains.
Guests can start their journey with a warm up in the Medina and sightseeing with a laid back scenic ride throughout the hustle and bustle of the magical city of Marrakech. Stop by the legendary Jemma El Fna for fresh squeezed orange juice with a spin around the lively main square. Pass the beautifully scented spice souks and historical landmarks such as the Koutoubia mosque, Royal Palace, UNESCO World Heritage Square and everyday city life. Prepare the senses to be overloaded by the encounters of the mysterious red city.
To continue this fun bike tour, cruise the exotic Marrakech’s Palmeraie. Enjoy riding through the lush palm groves, desert sand dunes, passing camels, small villages, and the colourful plants and spices that grow wild and free in this area. This true hidden gem of Marrakech is a unique environment, ideal for indulging in a Four Seasons signature picnic lunch set up exclusively in an authentic Berber tent.
On the second day, get ready for a once-in-a-lifetime experience and challenge with the exploration of the stunning Atlas Mountains. From the Resort, take a gorgeous scenic drive up in a 4×4 vehicle to the snowcapped mountains into true Berber life. After passing through several local villages, get submerged in the gorgeous vast lands on top-of-the-line Giant off-road mountain bikes. Thanks to the expertise of the guide, ride down the mountainside on a fully-equipped mountain bike and work out at one’s preferred pace in absolutely breathtaking scenery. Stand for just a minute contemplating the view in any direction and absorb a sense of nature’s peacefulness. End this magnificent experience with a delicious Moroccan lunch in a traditional Berber home.
Once back at the hotel, guests can treat themselves to well-deserved relaxation time by unwinding in the Resort’s world-class Spa or cooling down with a refreshing cocktail around the two large pools.
For those seeking for a leisurely experience to enjoy the scenery or for those who prefer a phenomenal sport challenge, this magical experience is ideal. Bringing together a taste of Morocco with the Resort’s peacefulness, the Bike Adventure Package is suitable for all and starts from EUR 510 per night for 2 guests, including:
Luxurious accommodations with view A bike tour of the Medina and Palmeraie followed by a signature Four Seasons picnic An exclusive bike excursion in the Atlas Mountains followed by a traditional Berber lunch Daily buffet breakfast at Solano restaurant Complimentary internet access Access to the Fitness Centre, including a full sports activities program Access to the whirlpool, steam room and sauna at Le Spa
